content.heroIntro: ALEGRIA XXII represents a exceptional opportunity to own premium new-build apartments in Torrevieja's vibrant Centro district. Developed by the trusted ALEGRIA brand, this project delivers 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom homes of 137m² designed for buyers seeking modern living with investment potential. Located in Spain's largest expat community where English is widely spoken, ALEGRIA XXII combines contemporary comfort with strategic location access to beaches, healthcare, and international amenities. With delivery scheduled for February 2026 and prices starting from €365,000, these apartments offer compelling value—45% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North while maintaining the same quality standards. ALEGRIA XXII is more than a residence; it's a gateway to Mediterranean lifestyle living in one of Spain's most dynamic coastal towns.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the beating heart of one of Spain's most cosmopolitan coastal destinations. This established neighbourhood combines authentic Spanish charm with international sophistication, making it the preferred address for discerning buyers from across Europe. The area benefits from excellent infrastructure, proximity to pristine Blue Flag beaches, world-class healthcare facilities including the 24-hour Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, and comprehensive shopping facilities. Centro attracts retirees, families, and investors alike, drawn by the unmatched expat community—the largest in Spain—where English is spoken everywhere and international schools serve expatriate families. The district's walkable streets connect you to waterfront promenades, gourmet dining, and cultural venues, while maintaining easy access to major transport links and neighbouring golf courses.
